short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A UID badge scanner and messaging solution

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UID Scanner/Messaging for Axion Cority ReadySet used for badge scanning and messaging at the University of Iowa Health Care.  This plugin allows University Badge scanning to work with the ReadySet system and messaging between staff.
